function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Circulation of contagious diseases due to large public events","Impact":"Cancellation or rescheduling of major trade events and popular Esport leagues","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety measures, vaccination mandates, and event capacity limits","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, thermal scanners, and air filtration systems","People":"Attendees of large public events","Owner":"Event organizers and government authorities"},{"Description":"Healthcare leadership and capacity under strain","Impact":"Risk of new recession and financial collapse, potential collapse of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, expansion of medical facilities, and recruitment of additional healthcare personnel","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, data analytics for healthcare resource allocation, and remote monitoring devices","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and the general population","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government, and private sector"},{"Description":"Economic and social impact on society","Impact":"Potential for socioeconomic crisis, business closures, and financial instability","Mitigation":"Implement immediate relief measures, develop long-term economic plans, and support entrepreneurship and sustainable business models","Technologies":"Digital financial platforms, economic forecasting models, and remote work technology","People":"Business owners, employees, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and private sector"}]}
